column2: Fixed adding property to XML properties file

column3: When adding new property to properties in XML format, the underlying file is never updated. New element is created, but not attached to root element of properties file.
This functionality is used for example in wicketforge plugin.
Method was not covered by tests, so I added also a test for it.

Have you submitted a contributor license agreement? If not, please download the PDF from http://www.jetbrains.org/display/IJOS/Contributor+Agreement and then print it out, sign, scan and email to contribute@jetbrains.com

Thanks, the request is pulled into IDEA master. Do you want it to be backported into 13.1.x branch?
Thank you! Backport would be nice, but not really necessary.
